items.sentence: Tom realized that he had fallen in love with Mary.
Tom said that he was eager to eat lunch with Mary.
Tom says he needs to talk to Mary about something.
Tom has already told Mary what\'s going to happen.
I can understand why you don\'t want to eat there.
You can\'t buy anything interesting in this store.
You can\'t make an omelette without breaking eggs.
You don\'t get up as early as your sister, do you?
You don\'t understand how worried I was about you.
Tom had a hunch that Mary was seeing someone else.
